snippet.title: Drop Duchy - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Play Drop Duchy's free demo on Steam NOW: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2525310/Drop_Duchy/

Discover more about Drop Duchy's perfect blend of deckbuilding, puzzle, and rogue-lite gameplay!

🧩 Build your Duchy piece by piece by thoughtfully placing distinct terrain pieces and structures
👑 Learn to master the power of the City with the now unlockable Republic faction
⚔️ Earn enough resources to prepare your forces to storm through fierce armies
🃏 Customize your deck to suit your strategy and optimize your realm’s growth
🔁 Enjoy endless replayability in this refreshing hybrid rogue-lite game

Your reign begins now with Drop Duchy's Demo available on Steam! 
And, get ready for its full release May 5th 2025!

https://x.com/SleepyMillGames
https://x.com/TheArcadeCrew

©The Arcade Crew - Sleepy Mill Studio - 2025, all rights reserved.
